name: tm59
effect: Teaches Dragon Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Incinerate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dragon Pulse)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
